name: 18th Annual Drug Discovery Summit
content: This summit brings together over 250 key opinion leaders and senior industry experts in drug discovery, to discuss the latest innovative discovery strategies in different therapeutic areas as well as the most effective enabling technologies and solutions. Our co-located 5th Discovery Chemistry & Drug Design Congress provides an unprecedented opportunity to gain insights from key presenters of the computational chemistry, discovery chemistry and medicinal field. For further information on the congress, please contact Guillaume Alonso on g.alonso@oxfordglobal.co.uk or call +44 (0) 1865 248 455.
